SPORTS

With the first half of fall intramurals underway the Rec Center is now gearing up for some tournament fun and the next big sport of the fall season indoor soccer PERIOD

Last year  teams signed up for indoor soccer the third largest intramural sport after flag football  teams and threeonthree basketball  teams PERIOD Threeonthree basketball is also making a return for the fall with a oneday tournament along with a kickball tournament PERIOD

We are just hoping all these numbers increase and that people who have never played before try it said Kate Quinlan coordinator for sports and competition PERIOD

Senior commercial music major Chris Coleman has spent the last few intramural seasons playing with his team named

You Know the Deal. last fall semester they came in second in the threeonthree tournament PERIOD

The experience was awesome the competition was nice and the officiating was wonderful said Coleman PERIOD It was a really good tournament and Im going to try and do it again this year. sPORT ENTRIES OPEN ENTRIES CLOSE PLAY BEGINS
